message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $90 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $105. This is my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $105. I'm willing to make one more offer to you. I'll sell it to you for $115. This is my final offer.
